scripts.dev:assets: node build-scripts/copystuff src/assets/common/** -o builds/dev && node build-scripts/copystuff src/assets/dev/** -o builds/dev
scripts.start: concurrently -k "yarn run watch:dev:css" "yarn run watch:dev:js" "yarn run watch:dev:assets" "yarn run serve:dev"
scripts.dist:css: node-sass --include-path src/scss src/main.scss builds/dist/main.css && cleancss -o builds/dist/main.css builds/dist/main.css
scripts.dist:assets: node build-scripts/copystuff src/assets/common/** -o builds/dist && node build-scripts/copystuff src/assets/dist/** -o builds/dist
scripts.dist: yarn run dist:js && yarn run dist:css && yarn run dist:assets
